Articles.Content:
Over the last few days I have been receiving a few bugs that causes KSP to hang and then crash.  I had enough time to grab a screen shot of the error message.

Installed version is 2788 plus breaking ground and no place like Kerbin (latest editions) installed on my Win 10 PC.  This post is my first and is more for information as I don't know where else to put is so the developers may work on it.

Any suggestions?

Error message is:  Kerbal Space Program - Unity 2019.2.2f1_ab112815d860
